name: Ritual Cult Administrator (RCA)
description:
"Ritual" was the theme for this fantastical strategy game! The game is designed to keep the player on their toes, managing to keep the Cultists happy while also making sure that Sylvanus was appeased on his way back into our reality. Incredibly inuitive design and a fun experience for strategy lovers everywhere!

A Prototype Artefact designed by Red Rapids:
Michaela
Gervince
Sonja
Sabrina
Ekaterina
Anton
